text: Edward Wayne LeBaron, Jr. (January 7, 1930 â€“ April 1, 2015) was an American football quarterback in the 1950s and early 1960s in the National Football League. He played for the Washington Redskins, Calgary Stampeders, and for the Dallas Cowboys. He was added into the College Football Hall of Fame in 1980, into the Bay Area Sports Hall of Fame in 2004 and was a charter inductee into the Sac-Joaquin Section Hall of Fame in October 2010. He died on April 1, 2015. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Washington Redskins players Category:Calgary Stampeders players Category:Dallas Cowboys players Category:Sportspeople from California
title: Eddie LeBaron
